text: Ki uha dharati ute ture-phire nahi' ki uha dekhade ki unham lokam da ata kiho jiha ho'i'a jihare inham tom pahila ho cuke sana. Uha inham tom zi'ada sakatisali sana ate unham ne dharati nu vahi'a ate isa nu inham tom zi'ada abada kita. Ate inham de kola inham de rasula sapasata nisani'am lai ke a'e. Isa la'i alaha unham ute zulama karana vala nahim si. Para uha khuda hi apane apa ute ati'acara kara rahe sana
